name: exterior
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
on or from the outside: In some of the villages the exterior walls of the houses are painted pink.exterior to Exterior to the main house there is a small building that could be used as an office or studio. Synonyms
external
outerOpposites
inner
interior
More examplesFewer examplesThey usually put a protective coating on the exterior surface of the walls.It can be hard to prove because this type of torture usually leaves no exterior marks.The car had a certain amount of exterior damage, but could be repaired.We'll need to hire a professional window cleaner to do the exterior windows.This practical all-weather jacket has three zipped inside pockets, as well exterior pockets.

C1 the outside part of something or someone: The Palace of Fontainebleau has a very grand exterior.exterior of The exterior of the house needs painting.on the exterior of There are shutters on the exterior of the windows. Behind that cold exterior there's a passionate man.
